images.caption: Figure 2:Overall pipeline of MM-IFEngine. Part(a)demonstrates the three-stage workflow of our engine: (1) Image filter; (2) Task generation using GPT-4o for images without QA pairs and instruct refinement for existing annotations; and (3) Constraints integration incorporating 6 main categories and 32 subcategories, ensuring compatibility between constraints and tasks. MM-IFEngine is employed to generate SFT and DPO training datasets and MM-IFEval benchmark, as shown in part(b)and(c). MM-IFEval implements three evaluation metrics combining rule-based verification functions and a judge model to ensure accurate assessment.
